overview:
Joshua Hinsdale is an executive level Internet marketing professional with more than 15 years of experience building brands and driving consumer demand. He specializes in new media, mass media, social media, marketing, communications, PR, business development, relationship management and promotions.

He is a Mexico travel specialist and author of a travel guide book covering Playa del Carmen and the Riviera Maya.

Hinsdale orchestrated the public launch of Citysearch.com around the country and then led the marketing and communications efforts at online shipping marketplace uShip.com as the company was struggling to find a corporate identity and establish market share. He currently serves as the head of the Communications Office at The United States Gold Bureau.
